Maki Rolls.description: Consists of fish or vegetable with rice and seaweed only, cut into six individual pieces

Shogun Classic Rolls.description:
(SM) = Spicy Mayonnaise (ES) = Eel Sauce (GC) Garlic Chili Sauce (HS) = House Spicy Sauce (PZ) = Ponzu Sauce (CO) = Chia Oil (SV) = Sushi Vinegar n
                    *All rolls can be made with soy paper for an additional- charge* *Substitutions and additions may incur an additional charge*
